title: Oliver Twisted
description: On the advice of a corpse, Oliver flees his ghastly orphan life to seek his destiny in the dark streets of old London Town. There, he meets the shadowy Dodger, the evil old soul-stealer Fagin, and the menacing Bill Sikes, who is more beast than man. But will Oliver be the world's salvation or its downfall?
author: J.D. Sharpe
